name: Inner City Blocks
tag_list: city-blocks, hoods, streets, zones, wards, inner-city-blocks, inner-city-streets, blockstar, my-hood, my-block, represent-your-city, represent-your-hood, inner-city, put-on-for-my-city, i-put-on-for-my-city, how-to-put-on-for-my-city-my-hood, i-rep-my-hoo
overview:
An online tagbook that allows readers to represent for their city by posting a particular neighborhood or area. Readers can vote on what gets posted and what block becomes block of the day.

Place to represent your city blocks, streets, avenue, boulevard, hoods, add fresh new blocks, search city blocks and become a city blocks reps.

Search for various city blocks, browse your city blocks, rep your block by voting for your favorite the city blocks, street, hoods, zone, & wards.

Put on for your city by becoming a blocks representative & rep your city with pride. Add your city blocks & let the world know.

external_links.title: Inner City Blocks, Inner City Adresses
